r.s: Converts a svg file to a png/jpeg image
r.d: Converts a svg file to a png/jpeg image with the help of apache-batik (java-program), needs therefore a php with ext/java compiled-in and the batik files from http://xml.apache.org/batik
r.n: - tested with batik 1.0 - has almost the same api as XML_fo2pdf
